gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Heat 104, Pistons 101
gameRecap.excerpt: Bam nails the buzzer-beater three to help Miami defeat Detroit, 104-101. For Miami, Duncan Robinson led the way with a season-high 30 points (seven 3PM) and five assists while aided by Bam Adebayo (20 points, 16 rebounds) and Terry Rozier (17 points, six rebounds, nine assists) in the victory. Evan Fournier finished with 18 points (four 3PM), four rebounds, and three steals with Cade Cunningham tallying 17 points and nine assists for Detroit in the losing effort. Miami improves to 37-30, while Detroit moves to 12-55 in the loss.
